SET(EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/3rdparty/eigen3")

ADD_CXX_CXXTEST_DRIVER(eigen_comb combTest.cpp INCLUDES ${EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR})
ADD_CXX_CXXTEST_DRIVER(eigen_cumtrapz cumtrapzTest.cpp INCLUDES ${EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR})
ADD_CXX_CXXTEST_DRIVER(eigen_filter filterTest.cpp INCLUDES ${EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR})
ADD_CXX_CXXTEST_DRIVER(eigen_filtfilt filtfiltTest.cpp INCLUDES ${EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR})
ADD_CXX_CXXTEST_DRIVER(eigen_gammalb gammalnTest.cpp INCLUDES ${EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR})
ADD_CXX_CXXTEST_DRIVER(eigen_iirfilterdesign iirFilterDesignTest.cpp INCLUDES ${EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR})
ADD_CXX_CXXTEST_DRIVER(eigen_interp1 interp1Test.cpp INCLUDES ${EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR})
ADD_CXX_CXXTEST_DRIVER(eigen_median medianTest.cpp INCLUDES ${EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR})
ADD_CXX_CXXTEST_DRIVER(eigen_percentile percentileTest.cpp INCLUDES ${EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR})
ADD_CXX_CXXTEST_DRIVER(eigen_sign signTest.cpp INCLUDES ${EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR})
ADD_CXX_CXXTEST_DRIVER(eigen_std stdTest.cpp INCLUDES ${EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR})
